sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The cdrtools package contains cdrecord, cdda2wav, mkisofs, readcd, scgcheck, isoinfo, isodump, dsovfy, devdump, rscsi and support libraries.

sect3.title: cdrecord
sect3.para: cdrecord records audio or data Compact Discs.

sect3.title: cdda2wav
sect3.para: cdda2wav dumps Compact Disc audio into wav sound files.

sect3.title: mkisofs
sect3.para: mkisofs and mkhybrid generates an ISO9660/JOLIET/HFS hybrid filesystem.

sect3.title: readcd
sect3.para: readcd reads or writes Compact Discs.

sect3.title: scgcheck
sect3.para: scgcheck is used to check and verify the Application Binary Interface of libscg.

sect3.title: support utilities
sect3.para: isoinfo, isodump, isovfy and devdump are utility programs for dumping and verifying iso9660 images.

sect3.title: rscsi
sect3.para: rscsi is a remote scsi manager.

sect3.title: support libraries
sect3.para: libdeflt, libfile, libhfs, librscg, libscg, libschily and libunls are the support libraries for this package.
